comments.comments_text: Amine Harit (Marseille) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.

comments.comments_text: Heung-Min Son looks very unsteady on his feet after that head injury. Safety first, so he’s coming off and Cristian Stellini has decided that Yves Bissouma (Tottenham) is the man to take his place.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Jordan Veretout sends a superb cross into the box. Chancel Mbemba (Marseille) latches on to it and from near the penalty spot powers a header low inside the left post, leaving Hugo Lloris beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there - excellent finish. The score is 1:0.

The score is 1:0.

comments.comments_text: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Cristian Stellini probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Ryan Sessegnon (Tottenham). He is replaced by Emerson Royal.

comments.comments_text: Clement Lenglet (Tottenham) outjumps the defence in the centre of the box and connects with the free kick from Ivan Perisic. He sends the ball into the bottom right corner with his towering header and alters the score to 1:1.
